title: Trouble Starting Match-made games.
body: After accepting a match made game, the champ select does not load and becomes a black screen then I am automatically kicked from game for not picking a champ after timing out. I have tried to play a game multiple times and cannot seem to start one. I have tried different game modes, closing out of client and opening it up again,and restarting my pc.

replies.body: I should also mention that I had these problems after the patch and didn't have them before.

It looks like your client is having a hard time reaching the server with a stable link. This could be due to a number of factors, however, the most common are local network configurations that don't play well with League. I see that you're on WiFi, so I definitely recommend trying a wired connection first, and if you still have problems, check out our [connection troubleshooting guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)

Let me know if anything with those steps changed your issue.
